price: „Ништа страшно!“ Рекоше, „ми ћемо своме Господару да се вратимо.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
